title: Can't access my emotes

replies.body: Hey there, I've seen this issue reported a few times.  I'm not sure about the direct cause, but I think it could be network related.  Restarting your client should fix up that error.

So I got this bug when the client changed to the Blue Essence (think 7.22) every day I play and every day I check and am unable to access my emotes loadout. Was able to use my emotes while in games up until a week ago but now even those are inaccessible to me. Simply restarting is not the solution to fix my problem.
thanks,
Bowel Cramps
{{champion:26}}

Up-date. I can access my emote loadout but can't save it. Error code: EM03.
I have tried restarting again this time and as before still nothing changes.
Never mind back to not working.

Yes. Sometimes I my Emote wheel will go blank!! When it does it stays blank until I restart.

And whenever I get a new emote, the wheel won't let me update it; I get an error message.

The solution is to restart client, but I'm hoping you guys can fix this.

Same thing is happening to me now to... I own all the emotes it would be nice  to use them... Feelsbadman... 
I just bought the new ones today even going in to it knowing... wont be able to use those. RIP
